member.name: T:MotionPath
member.summary: Move an object around a path.

member.name: P:MotionPath.Target
member.summary: The object that moves around this path.

member.name: P:MotionPath.Time
member.summary: Normalized time between 0 and 1 for how far the target is on this path.

member.name: P:MotionPath.UsePointRotation
member.summary: Rotate the target using the rotation of points, otherwise use the curvature of the path.

member.name: P:MotionPath.Duration
member.summary: How long the path takes to complete.
